scMiko 0.1.0
  • Reference

Generate heatmap with plotly interface

generateHeat.Rd

Generate heatmap with plotly interface. Takes output from scMiko::getHeat() function as input.

generateHeat(
  mat,
  heat.object,
  scale.limit = NULL,
  legend.label = "",
  x.label = "",
  y.label = "",
  title = ""
)

Arguments

mat

matrix. Must be same matrix provided to scMiko::getHeat().
heat.object

output from scMiko::getHeat()
scale.limit

Numeric specifying heatmap limits. If unspecified, defined as max(c(abs(max(mat)), abs(min(mat)))).
legend.label

Character.
x.label

x axis label. Character
y.label

y axis label. Character.
title

plot title. Character.

Value

plotly handle

Contents
